QuestData.Title: Oath of Service
QuestData.Description: Assembled before you are many of our world's greatest archers, rangers, beast masters, and trappers, ready to fight the Legion as one.$b$bIt is time to take your first step in becoming a true leader of hunters.$b$bWe gather at the fire pit and take our oaths of service before the statue of Ohn'ahra. Touch the statue and kneel before it while I recite the oath, and the Unseen Path will be reborn!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kneel before the eagle statue and pledge your service to the Unseen Path.
